channel.title: Project 07 | Eco | 317
channel.description:
Project 07 has been in development since 2010. We started with a completely blank base with the revision of 317. Many features have been added, including almost every NPC. Our home is Edgeville, where you can trade, merchant, or simply hang out there. Every single dupe has been patched, so don't even try it. Advertising, flaming, or excessive spamming, will result in a mute, or ban. The countless hours that have been put into this server by our development team, has finally paid off, as we are finally releasing this server for everyone to play, as of 8/10/2013. We hope that we can gain a lot of popularity through out the years that we run. We are also currently raising money for a custom domain, and a higher quality VPS. We would all be very grateful if anyone donates. Donation prices will be in our forums. A price list will also be implemented in our forums. If you have any questions, please contact us in-game, or via our email. Thank you for visiting! Enjoy! -Project 07 Dev team
Features include
-Perfect switching -No lag -VPS (bad quality, we need some donations! :D) -Staff spots open -Great economy -PK'ing level (not that dumb leeched one) -No dupes -No exploits -No bugs
Rules include -No excessive spamming -No advertising -No flaming staff, or anyone. You can give your personal opinions, just don't use profanity. -ABSOLUTELY NO BUG ABUSE
Violation of any of these will result in a ban, or mute.
PLAY NOW! http://project07.weebly.com/index.html
Pictures : 19+ Bosses [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TQYxkQ5.png[/img] More bosses [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7EsrA6P.png[/img] Perfect switching for brids! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/949uVRW.png[/img] Custom items [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CNZCmxO.png[/img] Dicing [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oNlZArp.png[/img] No duel arena dupe [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jClVTqJ.png[/img] Log-in page [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nfGQVOZ.png[/img] No Bank all lag! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BQc8FYD.png[/img] No see through mask! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/szIWUz4.png[/img] No DC on skillcape shop! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9mQvcD6.png[/img] Custom Whip Vine [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bczdd0W.png[/img] Working specs! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xr2AacU.png[/img]

item.title: Project 07 | Eco | 317
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

‘project 07 - 317’
*adds nex gear, spirit shields, rocktails, newer revision models, extreme potions, dicing…’

Looks just like any other server here on Mopar. I’ll let you decide if that’s good or bad yourself.

Read full topic
